alert.note: Alert for Cottonwood; Murray; Nobles (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 23 at 8:24PM CDT until October 23 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN JACKSON...EASTERN NOBLES...EASTERN MURRAY AND COTTONWOOD COUNTIES... At 823 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Slayton to near Fulda to near Brewster, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotter. Estimated wind gust of 60 mph was reported in Rushmore MN at approximately 8:02 PM CDT. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Westbrook and Dovray around 830 PM CDT. Lakefield, Heron Lake and Storden around 835 PM CDT. Windom around 840 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Jeffers, Bingham Lake, Mountain Lake and Comfrey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
